description: Start the day with this delicious breakfast recipe – think creamy chia pudding, toasted muesli and fresh berries.
keywords: Chia pudding,Pescatarian,Orange,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Egg free,Spring,Raspberry,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian
name: Muesli & Berries With Chia Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup Sam’s Pantry Almond Apricot & Date Toasted Muesli

recipeInstructions.text: Combine milk, zest and vanilla in a large bowl. Add chia seeds, then cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight, if time permits.
Spoon chia mixture into one half of a bowl. Spoon muesli into other half, then serve topped with berries.
